title: Happy Birthday, Honoka-chan!
detail_text: <:th_ch0101/>Honoka-chan, happy birthday~, yaaay!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Uwaah, that scared me! Was that a party popper!? Thank you, Chika-chan!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Fufu, are you enjoying your birthday party?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Of course! The cream puff you brought was really delicious!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>I’m glad you like it! It’s from a pastry shop in Numazu.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Fufu, being able to eat delicious food and even pastries like this is happiness~. But I guess it’s almost time for Aqours’ members to go home, huh....?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>No, we’re still okay. Besides, there’s still something that I need you to see, Honoka-chan.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>? I’ve gotten presents from everyone, so what else is left?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Fufufu, I have to repay the one-liner performance you did two days ago, Honoka-chan! So now Ai-chan and I are going to put on a pun show~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Eeeeh!? No way, that sounds like fun!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
